special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
Creatures you control have haste.
{1}{R} Page 1
Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or permanent it’s attacking.
{3}{R} Page 2
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, [i]In Defiance of Chaos[/i] deals damage equal to that creature’s power to target opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.
